official_title: A bill authorizing the Government of American Samoa to issue bonds and other obligations, and providing that such bonds and obligations shall be exempt from taxation.
short_title: American Samoa Bond Authorization Act of 1982

summary.text: American Samoa Bond Authorization Act of 1982 - Authorizes American Samoa to issue bonds and other obligations payable solely from revenues derived from any improvement or undertaking. Exempts such bonds from Federal, State, and local taxes. Prohibits the United States from being liable for such bonds.

titles.title: American Samoa Bond Authorization Act of 1982
A bill authorizing the Government of American Samoa to issue bonds and other obligations, and providing that such bonds and obligations shall be exempt from taxation.
